dict.string:
Key points - The app does not store or request any personal information - Feedback emails are stored temporarily, once the issue is resolved your email will be deleted - Our partners will collect data and use an unique identifier on your device to show you relevant ads - In the About & Privacy menu you can select if you we can continue to use your data to tailor ads for you
You can view the full privacy policy here: http://pigdogbay.blogspot.com/2018/05/privacy-policy.html
For further information contact pigdogbay@yahoo.co.uk
